bug.author: Starsky-Synlitec
bug.description: This is not a issue but a feature needed. When can we use facemesh with tfjs 2.0 ? And also the wechat-plugin with tfjs 2.0 ? Looking forward to it ~: )

comments.comment: You should be able to use facemesh with tfjs 2.0 today, just make sure to include a backend if you are using tfjs-core directly. Have you tried it and run into a problem?

<denchmark-link:https://github.com/tafsiri>@tafsiri</denchmark-link>
Thx for the reply. I tried but with wechat plugin. I guess it is because of the wechat-plugin: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/tensorflow/tfjs-wechat>https://github.com/tensorflow/tfjs-wechat</denchmark-link>
which is not updated to fit 2.0 yet.
